item.title: Hosting Minecraft
item.description: Introduction The hope is to run two minecraft servers simultaneously with the use of a minecraft admin panel, for quick deployment and management. If all is done and said, I will host the servers for anyone to join.

item.title: Minecraft Server Process
item.description: Introduction The hope is to run two minecraft servers simultaneously with the use of a minecraft admin panel, for quick deployment and management. If all is done and said, I will host the servers for anyone to join. MindMap Progress Finding a host, whether physically or provided via a cloud service Determine Appropriate Minecraft Versions for both Vanilla and Modded Experiences Determine which server clients are suitable for the minecraft server Determine which Server Panel is the most serviceable.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Introduction Who Am I? Hello there! I’m Timothy, just like you. I’ve discovered something interesting about myself while working on personal projects like OS installation, Virtual Machines, and running servers. I have this tendency to dive into various tangents, exploring different avenues along the way. It hasn’t always been smooth sailing, as I’ve faced my fair share of obstacles. But you know what? I’ve never let them discourage me. Instead, I’ve embraced the challenge, searching high and low for solutions and workarounds.
